Welcome To
==========

Port Aransas
============

[![Public Notices Icon](https://cityofportaransas.org/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/Green-Notice-Icon.png)](https://cityofportaransas.org/public-notices)

[Public Notices](https://cityofportaransas.org/public-notices)
==============================================================

[![Municipal Court Online Payment Icon](https://cityofportaransas.org/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/Green-Court-Icon.png)](https://cityofportaransas.org/departments/municipal-court/)

[Municipal Court Online Payment](https://cityofportaransas.org/departments/municipal-court/)
============================================================================================

Bring The Family
================

Welcome to our Port Aransas webpage. We're glad you're here visiting us online and we would love for you to visit us in person and bring the family. If you're already a resident with us, you know what a blessing it is to live in such a great community. We hope that the information you're after is here online and that we've made it easy to get to.

![Kids walking on the beach](https://cityofportaransas.org/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/Childrens-Photo.jpg)
